long_description: The comfortable, versatile, and bounce-free Nathan Mercury 2 Hydration Belt with 2 bottles is an ideal road-running companion for every level. Ergological(TM) neoprene and monofilament belt design offers soft, multidirectional stretch that eliminates bounce. Two 10 fl. oz. flasks with push-pull caps. Perforated neoprene in center for breathability and comfort. The Nathan Mercury 2 Hydration Belt features an iPhone-compatible stretch mesh zip pocket and reflective trim.
short_description: The comfortable, versatile, and bounce-free Nathan Mercury 2 Hydration Belt with 2 bottles is an ideal road-running companion for every level.
